div.head: CHAP. XCIX.
1 The Prophet setting foorth the Kingdome of God in Zion, 5 exhorteth all, by the example of forefathers, to worship Godat his holy Hill.
div.ab: The Lord raigneth, let the people tremble: he sitteth betweene the Cherubims, let the earth bee mooued. Hebr. stagger.
The Lord is great in Zion: and he is high aboue all people.
Let them praise thy great and terrible Name: for it is holy.
The Kings strength also loueth iudgement, thou doest establish equitie: thou executest iudgement and righteousnes in Iacob.
Exalt yee the Lord our God, and worship at his footstoole: for he is holy. Or, it is holy.
Moses and Aaron among his Priests, and Samuel among them that call vpon his Name: they called vpon the Lord, and he answered them.
He spake vnto them in the cloudie pillar: they kept his Testimonies, and the Ordinance that he gaue them.
Thou answeredst them, O Lord our God: thou wast a God that forgauest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inuentions.
Exalt the Lord our God, and worship at his holy hill: for the Lord our God is holy.
